content.stimulus_en: Plants die if they (not/have) ________ water.
If you freeze water, it (become) ________ ice.
If you (mix) ________ red and blue, you get purple.
If it (rain) ________, the ground gets wet.
When the sun (go) ________ down, it gets dark.
If you heat water, it (boil) ________.
If you don't eat, you get hungry.
The rings alarm if someone enters the building.
Water boils if it reaches one hundred degrees.
If press you the button, the machine starts.
If you heat ice, it melts.
If sunny, it's the temperature usually rises.
A future or related word for Resultado is '________'.
Truth

Ice

Heat
